familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Vice-President & Authorized Signatory of Riverhead Sound Associates LLC (Residential Real Estate in Riverhead, NY) from Feb 1, 2007, to Jan 1, 2017.

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Executive Vice-President & Authorized Signatory of Riverhead Sound Building Corp. (Residential Real Estate in Riverhead, NY) from Feb 1, 2007, to Jan 1, 2017.
